item.title: CVE-2022-40635|2024-09-16T16:13:57.113Z -- crafter%20software -- crafter%20cms
item.description: Improper Control of Dynamically-Managed Code Resources vulnerability in Crafter Studio of Crafter CMS allows authenticated developers to execute OS commands via Groovy Sandbox Bypass.
